Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to expanding eligibility for shock incarceration
Summary: Relates to expanding eligibility for shock incarceration, successful completion of such shall make such inmate eligible for release under certain conditions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the penal law, in relation to eligibility for shock incarceration
